posts.message:
[align=center][img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/w-purple.png[/img]

[b][size=xx-large][color=#ffffff][u]Hack Forum News - Edition Three[/u][/color][/size][/b]

[b]Hack Forum News is back this week with another update on the weekly news to keep you up to date on the latest news on site and around the world. If you have never heard of Hack Forum News, dont worry we have you covered. We are a team of members from the Hack Forums community who are journilists and writers, and we are here to keep you in the loop of the changes around the site and now even around the world.[/b]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/headlines.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=121196]

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6300857][color=#ffffff]HackForums Official X Account Unsuspended[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
This week, Omniscient announced that his official X account (formerly Twitter) has finally been reinstated after a period of suspension. He believes the suspension may have been the result of actions taken by a disgruntled forum member. To help prevent future issues, Omniscient has since upgraded to a premium account in hopes of avoiding a similar issue in the future.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6300873][color=#ffffff]HackForums Custom Cursor[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
As part of Omniscient ongoing efforts to revamp the forum with a fresh theme and updated styling, he's currently experimenting with custom cursors. At the moment, you might notice a gradient green cursor being trialed.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6301422][color=#ffffff]Userscripts and HF Rate Limits[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
Omniscient has been updating HF‚Äôs firewall and adding rate limits to combat bots and DDoS attacks. Some members may be mistakenly blocked, often due to browser userscripts like those used with Convo. If you notice you have been blocked, disable any userscripts and try again in about 10 minutes.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6299864][color=#ffffff]Hack Forums News - Weekly Reports[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=2331053]
A friendly reminder to everyone - if you notice any noteworthy events or happenings on the forum, please report them! The HF News team does its best to keep up, but your input helps ensure nothing slips through the cracks. We appreciate the support!

[hr]

[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/vibes-header.png[/img]
[size=medium]Writer -[/size] [mention=2890436]

[color=#FF56FF][b][size=20]Good day to all the beautiful members of HackForums![/size][/b][/color]

Hello everyone, it‚Äôs a new week and I hope everyone is doing well! I‚Äôm here once again to share some positive vibes with you all.

Recently in the world there have been a few major incidents, such as the situation surrounding Israel and Iran. If you're out there, please be safe! If you're too close to the main targeted areas, try to evacuate to a safe location if possible.

My thoughts and prayers are with you all.

---

[u][b][size=large]This Week's Wellness Tips[/size][/b][/u]

ü•ó [b]Eat Whole Foods[/b]  
Focus on fruits, vegetables, whole grains, nuts, seeds, and lean proteins.  
Limit processed foods and added sugars.

---

[u][b][size=large]Herb of the Week: Echinacea[/size][/b][/u]

[size=large][b]üåº Echinacea ‚Äì Full Health Benefits[/b][/size]

[b]1. Immune System Booster[/b]  
- Stimulates white blood cells and interferon production  
- Helps fight off colds and viral infections  

[b]2. Antiviral & Antibacterial[/b]  
- Fights pathogens like influenza, strep, herpes  
- Supports respiratory and sinus health  

[b]3. Anti-inflammatory[/b]  
- Reduces inflammation in sore throats, joints, and sinuses  

[b]4. Antioxidant Power[/b]  
- Contains flavonoids and cichoric acid to protect cells  

[b]5. Skin & Wound Healing[/b]  
- Speeds up healing of cuts, eczema, bites, and infections  

[b]6. Allergy Relief[/b]  
- May reduce histamine response and allergic reactions  

[b]7. Cancer Support (Under Study)[/b]  
- May help activate natural killer cells  

[b]8. Mood & Stress Support[/b]  
- May reduce mild anxiety and support nervous system balance  

[b]Popular Forms:[/b]  
[i]Tea, tincture, capsules, salves[/i]  

[b]‚ö†Ô∏è Caution:[/b]  
- Avoid if allergic to ragweed family  
- Limit use to short periods (7‚Äì10 days recommended)  
- Not ideal with immunosuppressants  

[i]Used for centuries, trusted today.[/i]

---

[u][b][size=large]Inspirational Quote of the Week[/size][/b][/u]

[i]"The wound is the place where the light enters you."[/i]  
‚Äî Rumi

---

[u][b][size=large]Inspirational Video of the Week[/size][/b][/u]

[video=youtube]https://youtu.be/EVerqpMjYYg?si=THJ-iEz4fL_aB35P[/video]

---

[u][b][size=large]This is Your Weekly Reminder That YOU MATTER![/size][/b][/u]

Don't let anybody else say otherwise. Your life matters. Though we may face some very difficult challenges in life, don't let that discourage you from enjoying life and being yourself.

Always be you, and don't allow other people's negativity to affect you.

If you ever feel like you need to talk to anybody about anything, feel free to send a convo or PM to me, Pikachu and I will be there to listen to your story.

If you are struggling with anything in your life ‚Äî whether it be depression, suicidal thoughts, acceptance, or anything along those lines ‚Äî here are some resources you may use:

[size=18][b]üåç INTERNATIONAL HOTLINES[/b][/size]

[b]Befrienders Worldwide[/b]  
Website: [url=https://www.befrienders.org]https://www.befrienders.org[/url]  

[b]Lifeline International[/b]  
Website: [url=https://www.lifelineinternational.org]https://www.lifelineinternational.org[/url]  

[size=18][b]üá∫üá∏ UNITED STATES[/b][/size]

[b]988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline[/b]  
Call or text: [b]988[/b]  
Website: [url=https://988lifeline.org]https://988lifeline.org[/url]  

[b]Crisis Text Line[/b]  
Text [b]HOME[/b] to [b]741741[/b]  
Website: [url=https://www.crisistextline.org]https://www.crisistextline.org[/url]  

[b]NAMI (National Alliance on Mental Illness)[/b]  
Phone: 1-800-950-NAMI (6264)  
Website: [url=https://www.nami.org]https://www.nami.org[/url]  

[b]The Trevor Project (LGBTQ+ Youth Crisis)[/b]  
Call: 1-866-488-7386  
Text [b]START[/b] to [b]678678[/b]  
Website: [url=https://www.thetrevorproject.org]https://www.thetrevorproject.org[/url]  

[b]Trans Lifeline[/b]  
Call: 1-877-565-8860  
Website: [url=https://www.translifeline.org]https://www.translifeline.org[/url]  

[size=18][b]üá®üá¶ CANADA[/b][/size]

[b]Talk Suicide Canada[/b]  
Call: 1-833-456-4566  
Text: 45645 (4 PM ‚Äì 12 AM ET)  
Website: [url=https://talksuicide.ca]https://talksuicide.ca[/url]  

[b]Kids Help Phone[/b]  
Call: 1-800-668-6868  
Text [b]CONNECT[/b] to [b]686868[/b]  
Website: [url=https://kidshelpphone.ca]https://kidshelpphone.ca[/url]  

[b]LGBT YouthLine[/b]  
Call: 1-800-268-9688  
Website: [url=https://www.youthline.ca]https://www.youthline.ca[/url]  

[size=18][b]üá¨üáß UNITED KINGDOM[/b][/size]

[b]Samaritans[/b]  
Call: 116 123  
Website: [url=https://www.samaritans.org]https://www.samaritans.org[/url]  

[b]Mind (Mental Health Support)[/b]  
Call: 0300 123 3393  
Website: [url=https://www.mind.org.uk]https://www.mind.org.uk[/url]  

[b]Switchboard LGBT+ Helpline[/b]  
Call: 0300 330 0630  
Website: [url=https://switchboard.lgbt]https://switchboard.lgbt[/url]  

[size=18][b]üá¶üá∫ AUSTRALIA[/b][/size]

[b]Lifeline Australia[/b]  
Call: 13 11 14  
Website: [url=https://www.lifeline.org.au]https://www.lifeline.org.au[/url]  

[b]QLife (LGBTQ+ Support)[/b]  
Call: 1800 184 527  
Website: [url=https://qlife.org.au]https://qlife.org.au[/url]  

[b]Beyond Blue[/b]  
Call: 1300 22 4636  
Website: [url=https://www.beyondblue.org.au]https://www.beyondblue.org.au[/url]  

[size=18][b]üá≥üáø NEW ZEALAND[/b][/size]

[b]Need to Talk? (1737)[/b]  
Call or text: [b]1737[/b]  
Website: [url=https://1737.org.nz]https://1737.org.nz[/url]  

[b]OUTLine NZ (LGBT+ Support)[/b]  
Call: 0800 688 5463  
Website: [url=https://outline.org.nz]https://outline.org.nz[/url]  

[size=18][b]üáÆüá≥ INDIA[/b][/size]

[b]iCall Mental Health Support[/b]  
Call: +91 9152987821  
Website: [url=https://icallhelpline.org]https://icallhelpline.org[/url]  

[b]Vandrevala Foundation Helpline[/b]  
Call: 9999 666 555 or 1860 2662 345  
Website: [url=http://www.vandrevalafoundation.com]http://www.vandrevalafoundation.com[/url]  

[size=18][b]üåà GLOBAL LGBTQ+ SUPPORT[/b][/size]

[b]It Gets Better Project[/b]  
Website: [url=https://itgetsbetter.org]https://itgetsbetter.org[/url]  

[b]ILGA World (International LGBTQ+ Network)[/b]  
Website: [url=https://ilga.org]https://ilga.org[/url]  

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/world-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]UK & Politics[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Labour‚Äôs welfare reforms face rebellions: Around 50 Labour MPs are resisting measures on Universal Credit and PIP, despite PM Starmer‚Äôs ¬£3‚ÄØbillion concessions; critics warn of a ‚Äútwo-tier‚Äù welfare system.

[b][url=https://www.theguardian.com/politics/live/2025/jun/27/welfare-bill-cuts-labour-conservatives-keir-starmer-uk-politics-latest-news-updates]Source[/url][/b]

Counter‚Äëterror arrests after RAF break‚Äëin: Four activists linked to Palestine Action were arrested for vandalising RAF Brize Norton; the government plans to classify the group as a terrorist organisation.

[b][url=https://www.ft.com/content/e1542032-6185-4146-abd8-5d0b7d493f84]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Global Affairs[/color][/size][/b][/u]

NATO summit outcomes: In The Hague (24‚Äì25 June), members‚Äîwhich included non-Atlantic partners like Japan and New Zealand‚Äîpledged to boost defense spending to 5% of GDP by 2035. The UK committed funds to Ukraine, including ¬£70‚ÄØmillion from frozen Russian assets and 12 F‚Äë35A jets equipped for nuclear deterrence.

[b][url=https://www.theguardian.com/world/2025/jun/25/wednesday-briefing-why-nato-is-rolling-out-the-red-carpet-for-donald-trump-at-key-summit]Source[/url][/b]

Middle East escalation: Israeli strikes hit Hezbollah, Iran, and a detention centre; Iran reportedly executed anti‚Äëregime prisoners in retaliation. North Korea may send troops to assist Russia.

[b][url=https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/europe/ukraine-russia-war-putin-trump-pows-sumy-nato-latest-news-b2778037.html]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Environment & Health[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Record-breaking wildfires: So far in 2025, the UK has seen its worst wildfire season on record, with the largest burnt area since records began in 2012.

[b][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2025_United_Kingdom_wildfires]Source[/url][/b]
[/align]
[hr]
[align=center][img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/gaming-header.png[/img]
[size=medium]Writer -[/size] [mention=811]

[color=#72FF84]Notable console & hardware releases:[/color]

[color=#FF5F54][b]PS6 Leak Stuns Gamers:[/b][/color]
A major leak about Sony's upcoming PS6 handheld console has shocked the gaming community with its impressive and unexpected specs. The new handheld console is rumored to include 16GB of RAM and is capable of running PS5 games.

[color=#FF5F54][b]Nintendo Switch 2 sales:[/b][/color][list]
[*]Launch sales of over 3.5 million units in the first four days (as of June‚ÄØ10,‚ÄØ2025)
[*]One-week US sales    Over 1.1 million units sold in launch week in the U.S. alone
[*]Full-year projection    15 million units by end of March 2026 (Nintendo‚Äôs target)
[/list]
Nintendo Switch 2 remains nearly impossible to buy. It is selling out across all major retailers in stores., and online. If you're lucky enough to get your hands on one. Post a thread in the Bragging Rights section [url=https://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=12]here[/url] and show off your new gizmo.

[color=#FF5F54][b]Gaming handheld showdown:[/b][/color]
Now there is a variety to choose from in the mobile gaming system community now with the release of the Nintendo Switch 2. Great contender coming up in the showdown with the release of the ASUS ROG Xbox Ally in the upcoming holiday season.
[list]
[*]Steam Deck OLED    -Released    Nov 16, 2023
[*]ASUS ROG Ally X    -Released    Jul 22, 2024
[*]MSI Claw 8 AI+    -Released January 15, 2025
[*]Nintendo Switch 2    -Released    Jun 5, 2025
[*]ASUS ROG Xbox Ally - Rolling out holiday season 2025
[/list]

[color=#72FF84]Notable News (June 2025)[/color]
[color=#FF5F54][b]Microsoft plans major Xbox layoffs[/b][/color]
6,000‚Äì7,000 roles globally are going to be cut by Microsoft to fund their $80‚ÄØbillion in 2025 on AI infrastructure, including data centers, Copilot, Azure AI, and their OpenAI partnership. Cuts are not happening because of financial instability for this massive conglomerate. Executives are doubling down on their AI, and laying off employees who are not directly related to sales generating roles, coders, security, and core AI/infrastructure teams.

[color=#FF5F54][b]Xbox Game Pass Ultimate discount[/b][/color]
$16.99/month via StackSocial
For both new and existing users in the U.S. and Canada: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate (normally $19.99/month) is discounted to $16.99/month, stackable for up to three months. Still not a better deal than if you visit our Premium Sellers Section [url=https://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=107]here.[/url]

[color=#72FF84]Notable Game Releases (June 2025)[/color]
Mario Kart World (Switch 2)
Death Stranding 2: On the Beach (PS5)
Five Nights at Freddy‚Äôs: Secret of the Mimic (PC and PlayStation 5)
The Alters (PC)
FBC: Firebreak (PC, Xbox, PlayStation)
Splitgate 2 (PC, Playstation, Xbox)
Persona 5: The Phantom X (Released on June 26 for iOS and Android)
System Shock 2: 25th Anniversary Remaster (PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Switch.)

üèÜ [color=#72FF84]E-Sports[/color]
Mid-Season Invitational (LoL): June 27‚ÄìJuly 12, top teams compete in Vancouver.
Dota 2 PGL Wallachia : June 20‚Äì29, $1M prize in Romania.
Rocket League RLCS Raleigh Major : June 26‚Äì29, major event in the U.S.
Valorant Game Changers Japan: June 24‚Äì29, female teams compete.
Overwatch Champions Series EMEA & NA: May 10‚ÄìJune 29, regional stages ongoing.

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/tech-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]AI & Cognitive Impact[/color][/size][/b][/u]

A new MIT Media Lab study found that students using ChatGPT showed the least brain engagement, lower critical thinking, poorer memory retention, and increasing dependence on copy-paste, a potential wake-up call about the ‚Äúcognitive cost‚Äù of AI tools.

[b][url=https://time.com/7298299/chatgpt-bad-for-brain-study]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]UK pumps ¬£500‚ÄØm into quantum computing[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Building on prior pledges, the UK government plans to invest over ¬£500‚ÄØmillion in quantum tech over four years to strengthen national security and innovation.

[b][url=https://www.ft.com/content/3ae0fa88-2884-47e5-93c4-4690f37ceceb]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Amazon invests $20‚ÄØbn in Pennsylvania data centers[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Massive build-out to power cloud and AI operations, creating over 1,200 jobs have been created with this movement.

[b][url=https://www.nditsolutions.com/news/title-business-technology-news-roundup-june-13-2025]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]T-Mobile Launches Satellite Messaging[/color][/size][/b][/u]

T-Mobile, in partnership with SpaceX, will launch satellite-to-phone messaging on July 23, 2025. Users with 5G phones can send texts from remote or off-grid areas. Basic SMS, MMS and emergency alerts included. Sadly, calls and the internet are not supported at launch but are planned for the near future.

[b][url=https://btw.media/news/top-tech-news-today-25-june-2025]Source[/url][/b]
